EmailTemplate.description: Internal notification to BRS creator detailing the BNF record created has been rejected
EmailTemplate.name: BNF Rejected: BNF record rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: BNF Rejected: {!BNF2__c.Sales_Org_Code__c} : Opp. #{!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} for {!Opportunity.Account} : {!BNF2__c.Product_SAP_Code__c}
